processing_summary.search_template: entity_name + sport + (digital transformation RFP OR mobile app tender OR web development RFP OR software development OR technology platform RFP OR digital platform)

classification_criteria.ACTIVE_RFP: Digital/software project + RFP indicators + Valid URLs
classification_criteria.SIGNAL: Digital/software project + RFP indicators OR valid URLs
classification_criteria.EXCLUDE: Non-digital projects OR no digital content

supabase_records.search_term: Manchester United FC Football ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: Found digital transformation RFP for Manchester United's fan engagement platform. The club is seeking a mobile app development partner for their digital loyalty program. Budget: £250K-£400K. Deadline: December 15, 2025. Contact: digital.projects@manutd.co.uk

supabase_records.search_term: Golden State Warriors Basketball ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: Chase Center Digital Transformation RFP - upgrading arena's digital infrastructure including IoT sensors, mobile ordering system, and fan engagement platforms. Budget: $750K. Deadline: January 15, 2026.

supabase_records.search_term: Toronto Blue Jays Baseball ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: Rogers Centre Digital Modernization RFP - comprehensive mobile app development and digital fan experience platform. Including AR features and real-time statistics integration. Budget: CAD 400K. Deadline: March 1, 2026.

supabase_records.search_term: NBA Basketball ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: NBA Technology Innovation RFP - seeking AI-powered analytics platform for game data and fan insights. Project scope includes machine learning models, real-time data processing, and mobile app integration. Budget: $500K-800K. Deadline: January 30, 2026.

supabase_records.search_term: LaLiga Football ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: LaLiga Digital Services Tender 2025 - comprehensive digital platform overhaul including streaming infrastructure, mobile apps, and fan engagement tools. Multi-year contract with budget of €2M-3M annually. Deadline: February 28, 2026.

supabase_records.search_term: Bundesliga Football ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: German Football League (DFL) - Digital Innovation RFP for Bundesliga. Seeking blockchain-based ticketing system and augmented reality fan experience platform. Budget: €1.5M. Deadline: March 15, 2026.

supabase_records.search_term: IPL Cricket ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: Indian Premier League Digital Innovation RFP - AI-powered content creation platform and fantasy sports integration. Seeking cutting-edge technology partners for fan engagement. Budget: ₹8 Crore. Deadline: February 10, 2026.

supabase_records.search_term: FIBA World Cup Tournament ("digital transformation RFP" OR "mobile app tender" OR "web development RFP" OR "software development" OR "technology platform RFP" OR "digital platform")
supabase_records.perplexity_content: FIBA World Cup 2027 Digital Platform RFP - comprehensive mobile app development and data analytics system for international basketball tournament. Multi-country deployment required. Budget: $1.2M. Deadline: April 30, 2026.
